extension.description: Night started as a project for myself to learn skinning but quickly evolved into a full skin. It's main features include: TV Show Logos, Bigger Episode thumbs, more realistic 3D thumbs in some views, and keeping fanart complimentary rather than the focus. Amongst other features just a skin that tries to do things differently...
extension.disclaimer: You are using a svn version of Night, there is no guarantee svn versions of this skin are stable.
